artist: Painter: After Francesco Mazzola (Il Parmigianino); Engraver: Conrad Martin Metz
description: two images printed on one sheet; left woman dressed in Greek/Roman style holding a large jug or vase on her head; facing away from viewer; on right man seated with an eagle at his feet
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, and Inscription

below image in brown: CMM sc./ PARMEGIANO/ In the Collection of Rich\'d Dalton Esq./ Publish\'d as the Act directs  Aug. 4, 1789 by C.M.Metz Upper Berkley Str\'t Portman Squ\'re | in pencil: 2-40
portfolio: From Immitations of Ancient and Modern Drawings
title: Parmegiano
